name: atopic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
caused by an allergy that can affect any part of the body, not just the part that touches the thing that causes the allergy: Eczema is also known as atopic dermatitis. An increase in house mites can trigger atopic asthma.
More examplesFewer examplesThere has been an alarming rise in atopic eczema.Her family had a history of atopic disease and was prone to asthma.A child with one parent who has an atopic condition has a one-in-four chance of having some form of atopic disease.
